name: Userscripts.org Dark Theme
description:
Other available dark themes are just not to my liking, contrast is usually too high.

Anyway, here it is. Hope you'll like it.

( I also use the "painted black - forms" style http://userstyles.org/styles/3865 )

20130113 -> minor update (make the new div#section also dark)
20100324 -> fixed input[text] box colors (bg, fg&bd-color)
